text: Futhi noma ngabe ulethe kulabo abanikwa incwadi zonke izibonakaliso angeke bayilandele iQibla yakho futhi nawe angeke wayilandela iQibla yabo. Futhi abanye babo angeke bayilandela iQibla yabanye, futhi noma ngabe ulandela izifiso zabo emuva kokuba sewufikelwe wulwazi ngempela uzoba ngomunye wabenzi bokubi (abedukileyo)
